attributes.action: resign and bring in Jeremy Clarkson as PM, James May as Chancellor and Richard Hammond as the minister for high shelves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has caused the country to go to hell in hand basket and I KNOW that the trio from a popular motoring show on BBC 2. Would be able to turn things around.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
